svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - February 10 2024
February 10 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
February 10, 2024" date: "2024-02-09"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
• Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Mainnet Dencun upgrade set for March 13 epoch 269568 ,
client releases in 2 weeks Goerli testnet : tested blob expiry with nodes using checkpoint sync Invalid blocks : triggering MEV-Boost
circuit breaker to local building discussion Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024): Priorities & complexities
of potential features: SSZification EIPs, ePBS, inclusion lists (EIP7547) and increase max EB (EIP7251); breakout calls planned peerDAS
(EIP7594) can be developed in parallel to Electra
Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
• Mainnet Dencun upgrade set for March 13 epoch 269568 , client releases in 2 weeks
Mainnet Dencun upgrade set for March 13 epoch 269568 , client releases in 2 weeks
• Goerli testnet : tested blob expiry with nodes using checkpoint sync
Goerli testnet : tested blob expiry with nodes using checkpoint sync
• Invalid blocks : triggering MEV-Boost circuit breaker to local building discussion
Invalid blocks : triggering MEV-Boost circuit breaker to local building discussion
• Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024): Priorities & complexities of potential features: SSZification EIPs,
ePBS, inclusion lists (EIP7547) and increase max EB (EIP7251); breakout calls planned peerDAS (EIP7594) can be developed in parallel to
Electra
Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024):
• Priorities & complexities of potential features: SSZification EIPs, ePBS, inclusion lists (EIP7547) and increase max EB (EIP7251);
breakout calls planned
Priorities & complexities of potential features: SSZification EIPs, ePBS, inclusion lists (EIP7547) and increase max EB (EIP7251);
• peerDAS (EIP7594) can be developed in parallel to Electra
peerDAS (EIP7594) can be developed in parallel to Electra
• Holešky testnet uneventfully upgraded to Dencun
Holešky testnet uneventfully upgraded to Dencun
• Dencun interop testing call video : testing churn limit on Holešky testnet & shadowfork planned with mainnet releases
Dencun interop testing call video : testing churn limit on Holešky testnet & shadowfork planned with mainnet releases
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 31.59% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 31.59% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 72% supermajority , could cause a chain split Supermajority dashboard
: simulate node operators changing to minority clients Consensus layer: Prysm 39%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
• Execution layer: Geth 72% supermajority , could cause a chain split Supermajority dashboard : simulate node operators changing to
minority clients
Execution layer: Geth 72% supermajority , could cause a chain split
• Supermajority dashboard : simulate node operators changing to minority clients
• Consensus layer: Prysm 39%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 39%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
• Toni Wahrstätter & Vitalik: options to increase block gas limit via increasing calldata cost; incentivize L2s to use blobs for data
availability
Toni Wahrstätter & Vitalik: options to increase block gas limit via increasing calldata cost; incentivize L2s to use blobs for data
• bloXroute relay in optimistic mode broadcast invalid blocks built by rsync builder on Feb 6 resulting in 9 missed slots
bloXroute relay in optimistic mode broadcast invalid blocks built by rsync builder on Feb 6 resulting in 9 missed slots
• Reth roadmap (EL client in Rust): targeting v0.2 beta late Feb & v1 production by end of April
Reth roadmap (EL client in Rust): targeting v0.2 beta late Feb & v1 production by end of April
Research
• Overview of spec changes for inclusion lists
Client releases
• Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.15.1 : hotfixes for Besu users, blindedLocal & lock file issues
Consensus layer:
• Lodestar v1.15.1 : hotfixes for Besu users, blindedLocal & lock file issues
• Execution layer: Geth v1.13.12 : mainnet Dencun upgrade Era1 initial implementation , provides Execution Layer data history pre-merge;
post-merge Execution Layer data is encapsulated within Beacon chain Era files Reth v0.1.0-alpha.17 : critical fixes for Dencun, sidechain
root validation & networking improvements
Execution layer:
• Geth v1.13.12 : mainnet Dencun upgrade Era1 initial implementation , provides Execution Layer data history pre-merge; post-merge
Execution Layer data is encapsulated within Beacon chain Era files
Geth v1.13.12 : mainnet Dencun upgrade
• Era1 initial implementation , provides Execution Layer data history pre-merge; post-merge Execution Layer data is encapsulated within
Beacon chain Era files
• Reth v0.1.0-alpha.17 : critical fixes for Dencun, sidechain root validation & networking improvements
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.17 : critical fixes for Dencun, sidechain root validation & networking improvements
For stakers
• Remy Roy: guide to migrating a validator to a larger disk
Layer 2
• Polygon Type 1 Prover open sourced
Polygon Type 1 Prover open sourced
• RollCall (L2 standards) precompiles breakout call and notes : secp256r1 precompile (RIP7212) live on Polygon testnet and rollup
precompile registry in progress
RollCall (L2 standards) precompiles breakout call and notes : secp256r1 precompile (RIP7212) live on Polygon testnet and rollup precompile
registry in progress
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs: EIP7612 : State storage transition using an overlay tree EIP7619 : Precompile Falcon512 generic verifier
EIPs:
• EIP7612 : State storage transition using an overlay tree
EIP7612 : State storage transition using an overlay tree
• EIP7619 : Precompile Falcon512 generic verifier
EIP7619 : Precompile Falcon512 generic verifier
• RIPs (Rollup Improvement Proposals): RIP7614 : Expose call stack to contracts
RIPs (Rollup Improvement Proposals):
• RIP7614 : Expose call stack to contracts
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7613 : Puppet proxy contract ERC7615 : Atomic push-based data feed among contracts ERC7616 : Hybrid
fungible token ERC7617 : Chunk support for ERC5219 mode in web3 URL ERC7618 : Content encoding in ERC5219 mode web3 URL
ERCs (application layer):
• ERC7613 : Puppet proxy contract
ERC7613 : Puppet proxy contract
• ERC7615 : Atomic push-based data feed among contracts
ERC7615 : Atomic push-based data feed among contracts
• ERC7616 : Hybrid fungible token
ERC7616 : Hybrid fungible token
• ERC7617 : Chunk support for ERC5219 mode in web3 URL
ERC7617 : Chunk support for ERC5219 mode in web3 URL
• ERC7618 : Content encoding in ERC5219 mode web3 URL
ERC7618 : Content encoding in ERC5219 mode web3 URL
Stuff for developers
• EthereumJS releases : Dencun upgrade support, WASM used by default for crypto primitives, RPCStateManager, expanded EIP1186 proof
functionality and Tx addSignature API
EthereumJS releases : Dencun upgrade support, WASM used by default for crypto primitives, RPCStateManager, expanded EIP1186 proof
• Gaslite Merkle Drop base contracts: GasliteMerkleDN (native tokens) & GasliteMerkleDT (ERC20)
Gaslite Merkle Drop base contracts: GasliteMerkleDN (native tokens) & GasliteMerkleDT (ERC20)
• Ethers js v6.11.0 : adds EIP4844 blob transactions
Ethers js v6.11.0 : adds EIP4844 blob transactions
• Ethers-kt (Kotlin): async library for EVM interaction, targets JVM & Android platforms
Ethers-kt (Kotlin): async library for EVM interaction, targets JVM & Android platforms
Ecosystem
• Ethereum Protocol Fellowship study group , 10 week series starts Feb 19, research & development tracks, precursor to fifth cohort
Ethereum Protocol Fellowship study group , 10 week series starts Feb 19, research & development tracks, precursor to fifth cohort
• Ethereum Foundation academic grants round , $1M available
Ethereum Foundation academic grants round , $1M available
Job Listings
• Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
• Nethermind: Distributed System Engineer (DSE) and Cryptography Researcher
Nethermind: Distributed System Engineer (DSE) and Cryptography Researcher
• EF seek an Executive Assistant to support senior decision makers
EF seek an Executive Assistant to support senior decision makers
• Sourcify seek a TypeScript Developer
Sourcify seek a TypeScript Developer
• Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
• MetaMask Staking: Staff Software Engineer and Software Engineer
MetaMask Staking: Staff Software Engineer and Software Engineer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
• Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.4 to 367 gwei, with 35.2 gwei average Zero net issuance currently at 22.2 gwei 10.1k ETH net burn
this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.4 to 367 gwei, with 35.2 gwei average
• Zero net issuance currently at 22.2 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.2 gwei
• 10.1k ETH net burn this week
10.1k ETH net burn this week
• ETHUSD : $2,279 - $2,522, currently $2,495
ETHUSD : $2,279 - $2,522, currently $2,495
• ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
• GoDaddy integrated with ENS, users can associate an address with their domain name
GoDaddy integrated with ENS, users can associate an address with their domain name
• POAP Collections : curate groups of POAPs
POAP Collections : curate groups of POAPs
• Kain Warwick: Synthetix 2024 roadmap
Kain Warwick: Synthetix 2024 roadmap
• Brice reflects on app governance upon leaving GHO liquidity committee
Brice reflects on app governance upon leaving GHO liquidity committee
• Gitcoin Grants proposed updates : refocus on open source software & ETH infrastructure with rounds every 6 months & $1M matching pool,
communities can run their own web3 community & education rounds
Gitcoin Grants proposed updates : refocus on open source software & ETH infrastructure with rounds every 6 months & $1M matching pool,
Regulation/business/tokens
• SEC “dealer” rule finalized , excludes those with/controlling less than $50M in assets
SEC “dealer” rule finalized , excludes those with/controlling less than $50M in assets
• Jake Chervinsky: state of crypto vs SEC
Jake Chervinsky: state of crypto vs SEC
• Kain Warwick: SEC response to ICOs created worse outcomes than if they had done nothing
Kain Warwick: SEC response to ICOs created worse outcomes than if they had done nothing
General
• Josh Stark: Trust Experience shape expectations of future blockchain behavior
Josh Stark: Trust Experience shape expectations of future blockchain behavior
• Vitalik: authenticate people by asking security questions to mitigate deep fakes
Vitalik: authenticate people by asking security questions to mitigate deep fakes
• Constant-size zk-SNARKs in ROM from Falsifiable Assumptions
Constant-size zk-SNARKs in ROM from Falsifiable Assumptions
